summary: A.K.A UNP2SB V1 - Bodyslide preset that TRIES to go from UNP to 7B body types.
descriptionHtml:
[b][center]
[color=#ff0000]WARNING! NUDITY!!!

[/color][color=#ff7700]This file is possibly outdated, you can still load it and use it on Bodyslide but it might not look as close as intended, because of missing sliders.

[/color]--> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82029/?]Updated UUNP version[/url] <--[/center][/b]

This my own Bodyslide SliderPreset .xlm file.

I wanted a skimpy/eyecandy body type without the HUGE breast that breaks all the immersion, so I tried to get something that went from UNP Body to 7B. 
The breast may seem huge at weight 100 but it not overwhelming your screen, while remaining attractive, and fits well with Bodyslided armors. 

The mod is HDT/non-HDT compatible. 

[u][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#f1c232][b]INSTALATION[/b][/color][/font][/u]

Copy the .xlm file to your .../Skyrim/Data/CalienteTools/BodySlide/SliderPresets

[color=#f1c232][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][u][b]REQUIERMENTS[/b][/u][b] [/b][/font]
[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]CBBE[/url] v3
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2[/url] 
Any CBBE texture/normalmap


[u][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#f1c232][b]RECOMMENDED MODS[/b][/color][/font][/u] (All used in screenshots)

[color=#6fa8dc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and TBBP HDT[/url][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800]Groovtama's XPMS Extended
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996]HDT Physics Extentions[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601]Realistic Ragdolls and Force[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]CBBE
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23812/?]Seasons of Skyrim ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46925/?]Tamriel Reloaded[/url]



[b][center][color=#6aa84f][size=4]FAQ[/size][/color][/center]

[/b][center][color=#6aa84f]Q[/color] : Is this a body replacer?
[color=#ffe599]A[/color] : No, it is a BodySlide preset, that's why you need CBBEv3 and BodySlide. 

[color=#6aa84f]Q[/color] : Any armor replacer?
[color=#ffe599]A[/color] : Use ''Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and TBBP HDT''. It works, trust me. 

[color=#6aa84f]Q[/color] : I don't like this, can you ... ?
[color=#ffe599]A[/color] : No you can do it yourself with BodySlide, it's easy. 

[color=#6aa84f]Q[/color] : What?
[color=#ffe599]A[/color] : Is a unicorn?
[color=#6aa84f]Q[/color] : No
[color=#ffe599]A[/color] : Then?
[color=#6aa84f]Q[/color] : I'm the one asking questions. 
[color=#f9cb9c]A[/color] : ...[/center]


[i][u]
[color=#d5a6bd][size=4]NEW WITH BODYSLIDE?[/size][/color][/u][/i]


I suggest you go download the ''Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and TBBP HDT'' (best clothing/armor replacer since you can manually adjust each sliders on armors and remove parts with Bodyslide). Then follow the instructions in the mods FAQs to know how to do it, thats how I learned. 
However I can teach you those beginners steps : 

- Open BodySlide
- Choose 'UNP2SevenB' in Presets
- In Outfit/Body, you are going to chose on which body (determines if HDT or TBBP or none) or armor you want to apply the preset. 
- Press 'Build' to apply it on the selected Outfit/Body or 'Patch Build' to apply it on many. 

[color=#d5a6bd]- If you are using Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and TBBP HDT select all CT77 options in Outfit/Body (CT77Body to customise the body if you want, save your new preset and apply it to all CT77 with Batch Build or build all armors/clothes one by one to fully customise sliders and delete armor pieces for more eyecandy).
[/color]



[color=#d5a6bd][u]TIPS TO CUSTOMISE MY PRESET[/u] : [/color]

- For bigger breast : You will mainly only have to increase ''DoubleMelon'' and maybe adjust other breast sliders.  
- When you customise it for amors, i suggest to set ''BreastFlatness'' to 10% and decrease ''NippleDown'' to your liking. 


Change log :
0.9 Release - BETA
1.0 Release - Higher knees and smaller ankles/Breast looking more natural/Lots of little changes


[color=#f1c232] Hope you enjoy![/color]
[color=#e06666]

CREDITS : Thanks to Caliente for CBBE body and BodySlide. 

[/color]
author: makounen60
